thread.title: Top Swedish Politicians Vindicate Trump’s Remarks On State Of Sweden
thread.title_full: Top Swedish Politicians Vindicate Trump’s Remarks On State Of Sweden

author: John Falkenberg
title: Top Swedish Politicians Vindicate Trump’s Remarks On State Of Sweden
text:
Obama’s DISASTROUS Catch-And-Release Program Left 1 MILLION Illegals Here for Trump to Deal With 
“Riots and social unrest have become a part of everyday life,” they explained. “Police officers, firefighters and ambulance personnel are regularly attacked. Serious riots in 2013, involving many suburbs with large immigrant populations, lasted for almost a week.” 
“Gang violence is booming,” they claimed. “Despite very strict firearms laws, gun violence is five times as common in Sweden, in total, as in the capital cities of our three Nordic neighbors combined.” 
There’s a shock. Gun restrictions don’t reduce gun violence? Wow.   
“Anti-Semitism has risen,” the two politicians added. “Jews in Malmo are threatened, harassed and assaulted in the streets. Many have left the city, becoming internal refugees in their country of birth. 
“For the sake of the American people, with whom we share so many strong historical and cultural ties, we can only hope that the leaders in Washington won’t make the same mistakes that our socialist and liberal politicians did,” they concluded. 
That’s a powerful picture of what could happen if the liberal mentality completely controlled the U.S. government. I think we can be grateful that here we have a president who just isn’t going to let that happen.
